title: Gross domestic product of the Arab world in 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and GDP in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The GDP in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Country Saudi Arabia and lowest at Country Comoros.
The difference of GDP in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Country is 785.34.
